{{notability|date=March 2009}} {{primarysources|date=March 2009}} {{Italic title}} {{Infobox Journal | title = Sicherheit und Frieden - Security and Peace | cover = | discipline = [[Political science]], [[peace and conflict studies]] | language = German, English | abbreviation = | publisher = [[Nomos]] | country = Germany | frequency = Quarterly | history = 1983-present | openaccess = | website = http://www.security-and-peace.de/ | ISSN = 0175-274X }} '''''Sicherheit und Frieden''''' (English: ''Security and Peace'') is a quarterly German [[academic journal]] focusing on peace research and [[security policy]] publishing articles in German and English. Since 2004 the journal also publishes [[peer review|peer-reviewed]] articles. [[Editor in chief]] is currently [[Michael Brzoska]] (Institute for Peace Research and Security Policy, University of Hamburg).
== Scope == The journal aims to serve as a forum linking civil society and the armed forces in the areas of science and politics. It publishes research analysis, insider reports and opinion pieces. It addresses issues such as security policy and peace research from scientific aspects of arms control to questions of nation building in post-war societies.
